mapper.delete: DELETE FROM community WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM community WHERE communityno=#{communityno})and communityno=#{communityno}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM community WHERE UPPER(title) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{word})||'%'OR UPPER(tag)LIKE '%' ||UPPER(#{word})

SELECT c.communityno,c.title,c.content,c.vcnt,c.rcnt,c.writedate,c.tag,c.memberno,c.ctypeno,ca.cano, ca.filename, ca.filesize, ca.thumbfile,ca.communityno FROM community c INNER JOIN communityattachment ca ON c.communityno = ca.communityno
